page.title: 04NAIRN:GIRL GUIDES
page.content: At the age of 10,a brownie can become a girl guide.In Nairn there are 2 sections of guides:Rosebank'A'company and 'B'company.One company meet at Rosebank church and the others meet at Millbank school.The guide leader of Rosebank'A'company is Miss Kennedy. There are about 45 guides in this company.Guides meet from 7.00 to 9.00 every Friday night.They are split up into 6 patrols:Primrose,Poppy,White heather,Forget-Me-Not,Orchid and Snowdrop.The guide{uniform}is a blue guide blouse,green tie(with woggle),a guide belt,and a navy blue skirt.This year 20 girl guides are going to Holland for 10 days.To become a guide you have to stay in the company for 3 months then you get enrolled to become a full member.To receive{badges}you have to challenge yourself but some badges are easier than others.
